title: Amazon Essentials Men's Jeans, Slim Fit Stretch, Bootcut
description: SLIM FIT: These men's slim fit jeans are designed to sit comfortably at the waist, fit slim through the hip and thigh, and taper at the leg for a polished, modern appearance
ALL-DAY COMFORT: Enjoy the feeling of light-stretch, mid-weight cotton denim that provides all-day comfort, allowing you to stay stylish without sacrificing ease of wear
VERSATILE STYLE: The classic men's jean features a bootcut flare design, making them ideal for both business casual events and everyday outings, an essential in any wardrobe
DURABLE DETAILS: Built to last, these men's bootcut jeans come with a zippered fly, metal shank button, bartack reinforcements, and riveted front hand pockets for added durability
EASY CARE: Made with stretch denim for flexibility, these men's jeans are best hung to dry, maintaining quality and prolonging the garment's life

These slim jeans for men offer a flattering slim fit through the hip and thigh with a bootcut leg opening. Tailored for those seeking a slim fit, these jeans sit comfortably at the waist, providing a sleek and contemporary silhouette. Crafted from mid-weight cotton denim, these bootcut jeans have a hint of stretch, providing flexibility and comfort for all-day wear and are ideal for both business casual settings and everyday wear. With a classic five-pocket design and thoughtful details such as a zippered fly, metal shank button closure, and rivets at the front hand pockets, these jeans for men allow for functionality without sacrificing style. Opt for these versatile men's bootcut jeans for a timeless, lived-in look. For an extended garment life, it is recommended to hang them to dry after washing
